longDesc: Elevate your bar or restaurant with the customizable Aldelo POS system. With thousands of installs for its original Aldelo for Restaurants app, Aldelo has built a strong reputation in the competitive app market. Upgrade to the cloud-based Aldelo Express for even greater efficiency.

features.description: Cloud-based system that aids in storing data in case of hardware issues
Easily access sales data and other information from remote locations
Integrate a variety of modifiers to customize orders
Build menus personalized for you and your staff
